problem.markdown:
>>In the closed network model graphed in this video (system diagram in slide 96), what was the greatest number of machines at a station? <<
= 15 +- 1%
[explanation] s_j = 2, 1, 2, 1, 15. Therefore 15 is the maximum number of machines a station has. [explanation]

numericalresponse.label: In the closed network model graphed in this video (system diagram in slide 96), what was the greatest number of machines at a station?

div.p: s_j = 2, 1, 2, 1, 15. Therefore 15 is the maximum number of machines a station has.
